data.name: Don't Sink - OST
data.detailed_description:
The official soundtrack for Don't Sink captures the beautiful and adventurous spirit of being a pirate. The music carries you from one unique region to the next and features a vast selection of emotions ranging from somber to bombastic.

Track List

  • Theme - 2:30
  • Trailer - 1:02
  • Travel - 2:37
  • Battle - 1:56
  • Boarding - 2:31
  • Abloco - 1:44
  • Caaporan - 1:44
  • Coconut Isles - 1:44
  • Koldogrado - 1:44
  • Oshiekra - 1:44
  • Sfenamaria - 1:44
  • Treasure Island - 1:04
  • Ship Wrecked - 0:57

File Formats

We've included OGG and WAV formats.

Where to find the tracks?

You'll be able to find the OST inside of your Don't Sink game directory. The whole OST can be located in a folder called OST.

data.short_description: The official soundtrack for Don't Sink captures the beautiful and adventurous spirit of being a pirate. The music carries you from one unique region to the next and features a vast selection of emotions ranging from somber to bombastic.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Various integrated graphics cards will not run the game and specific anti-virus programs are known to cause issues

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14 or above (64-bit Only)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 or better
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Various integrated graphics cards will not run the game and specific anti-virus programs are known to cause issues
